name: Death Bread: The Bread that Eats
name_original: Death Bread: The Bread that Eats
description:
A scientist chef was working in a lab to create a new type of mustard that would revolutionize the condiment scene. A radical new mustard isotope was discovered. Alien sandwiches from outer space had observed the chef closely. They watched and waited from outer space. When a breakthrough finally occurred, they had to have that mustard. To get this new condiment they traveled to Earth, knowing they would have to do battle for it. Armed with shrink rays, they miniaturized the Chef and Sou Chef so they could fight an even battle. Now you must fight to protect your mustard recipe!

Developed in Unity
